title: Champion Selected Fail
body: So yesterday 18/10/2016 I went into a ranked match. In the late game my internet died and I couldn't rejoin back in time because me internet is slow to boot up. So the next day (Today) I go to queue up with my buddy and we have to wait the 20 min AFK ban. So we wait the ban out and go into queue. We get a match and both of us accept and then everyone accepts and we should enter champion select. But both my buddy and my client don't load the champion select. So after about a min we get kicked out of queue and we are told that we have a 5 minute ban because not choosing a champion. So now we have to wait the 5 minutes plus the the 20 minute AFK ban so in total 25 minutes just to get in a match. I don't know why this happened but now I'm annoyed because basically we are waiting half a match to get into one. If so could someone help me with anything that could be done or do we just have to put up with this.

replies.body: I am having the same problem now! Disconnected and can't get back in. Now serving 20 min. ban! Riot refund my money!!!
